column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Uncle , keep heading north .
#Text=I seal the lamp oil inside an animal skin casing , Shyu lights the oil soaked twine and , ta - da !
#Text=Fake firebending !
#Text=" Katara says : " You 've really outdone yourself this time , Sokka .
#Text=" Shyu says : " This might actually work .
#Text=" Shyu says : " The sages will hear the explosion , so as soon as they go off , you rush in !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's almost sunset .
#Text=Are you ready ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Definitely .
#Text=" Aang says : " They 're still locked !
#Text=" Shyu says : " It did n't work .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why , wo n't , it , open ?!
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang !
#Text=Stop !
#Text=There 's nothing else we can do ... " Aang says : " I 'm sorry I put you through all of this for nothing .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't get it .
#Text=That firebending looked as strong as any firebending I 've seen .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , you 're a genius !
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait .
#Text=How is Sokka a genius ?
#Text=His plan did n't even work .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Come on Aang .
#Text=Let her dream .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're right .
#Text=Sokka 's plan did n't work .
#Text=But it looks like it did .
#Text=" Aang says : " Did the definition of genius change over the last hundred years ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " Come quickly !
#Text=The Avatar has entered the sanctuary !
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " How did he get in ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " I do n't know .
#Text=But look at the scorch marks !
#Text=And down there !
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " He 's inside !
#Text=Open the doors , immediately !
#Text=Before he contacts Avatar Roku !
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " It 's the Avatar 's lemur .
#Text=He must have crawled through the pipes !
#Text=We 've been tricked !
#Text=" Shyu says : " Now , Aang !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang !
#Text=Now 's your chance !
#Text=" Zuko says : " The Avatar 's coming with me !
#Text=Close the doors !
#Text=Quickly !
#Text=" Katara says : " Go !
#Text=" Katara says : " He made it !
#Text=" Aang says : " The light hits the statue and I talk to Roku .
#Text=So why is n't anything happening ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why is n't it working ?
#Text=It 's sealed shut !
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " It must have been the light .
#Text=Avatar Roku does n't want us inside .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why is n't anything happening ?
#Text=I do n't know what I 'm doing !
#Text=All I know is airbending !
#Text=Please Avatar Roku , talk to me !
#Text=" Roku says : " It 's good to see you Aang .
#Text=What took you so long ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why did you help the Avatar ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " Because it was once the sages ' duty .
#Text=It is still our duty .
#Text=" Zhao says : " What a moving and heartfelt performance .
#Text=I 'm certain the Fire Lord will understand , when you explain why you betrayed him .
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " Commander Zhao .
#Text=" Zhao says : " And Prince Zuko .
#Text=It was a noble effort , but your little smokescreen did n't work .
#Text=Two traitors in one day , the Fire Lord will be pleased .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're too late , Zhao !
#Text=The Avatar 's inside and the doors are sealed .
#Text=" Zhao says : " No matter .
#Text=Sooner or later , he has to come out .
#Text=" Roku says : " I have something very important to tell you , Aang .
#Text=That is why , when you were in the Spirit World , I sent my dragon to find you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Is it about that vision ?
#Text=The one of the comet ?
#Text=" Roku says : " Yes .
#Text=" Aang says : " What does it mean ?
#Text=" Roku says : " One hundred years ago , Fire Lord Sozin used that comet to begin the War .
#Text=He and his firebending army harnessed its incredible power , and dealt a deadly first strike against the other nations .
#Text=" Aang says : " So the comet made them stronger ?
#Text=" Roku says : " Yes .
#Text=Stronger than you could even imagine .
#Text=" Aang says : " But that happened a hundred years ago .
#Text=What does the comet have to do with the War now ?
#Text=" Roku says : " Listen carefully .
#Text=Sozin 's Comet will return by the end of the summer , and Fire Lord Ozai will use its power to finish the War , once and for all .
#Text=If he succeeds , even the Avatar wo n't be able to restore balance to the world .
#Text=Aang .
#Text=You must defeat the Fire Lord , before the comet arrives .
#Text=" Aang says : " But I have n't even started learning waterbending !
#Text=Not to mention earth and fire !
#Text=" Roku says : " Mastering the elements takes years of discipline and practice .
#Text=But if the world is to survive , you must do it by summer 's end .
#Text=" Zhao says : " When those doors open , unleash all your firepower !
#Text=" Katara says : " How 's Aang gon na make it out of this ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " How are we gon na make it out of this ?
#Text=" Aang says : " What if I ca n't master all the elements in time ?
#Text=What if I fail ?
#Text=" Roku says : " I know you can do it Aang .
#Text=For you have done it before .
#Text=The solstice is ending .
#Text=We must go our separate ways , for now .
#Text=" Aang says : " But I wo n't be able to come back to the temple .
#Text=What if I have questions ?
#Text=How will I talk to you ?
#Text=" Roku says : " I am a part of you .
#Text=When you need to talk to me again , you will find a way .
#Text=A great danger awaits you at the temple .
#Text=I can help you face the threat .
#Text=But only if you are ready .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm ready .
#Text="
